reviews.review_msg: Mike's teaching is definitely hard to understand, but you come to grips with it. Ask lots of questions, even tho it can be intimidating - he is always happy to help. Make full use of his office hours! His exams are pretty much like the previous years' so practise those. I had no background in stats & I feel like I walked away with good knowledge:)

Mike is a terrible instructor.  He is rude, arrogant and condescending.  He spends his lectures talking to the floor while he muddles through his error-laden notes and scribbles with chicken scratch on the overhead.  He argues with students in class and chastices people that do not think the way he does.  Do not take his class if you dont have to!

Great Prof. EXTREMELY knowledgeable. Can seem a bit unapproachable at first but actually very nice, helpful, and really wants students to understand. Exams are very fair but he marks hard. Don't worry if you do poorly on the midterm, almost everybody does much better on the final. Know the big concepts, don't fret over the details.
